version_description:
Adding more goodness!

For all iPhones:
+ current temperature in the daily view! (most requested)
+ GPS only while the app is open
+ calendar dates in the daily view
+ optimized for iOS 9
+ increased to 10 locations

Additional

NEW
- Algorithm v2.0: Hourly data is used to calculate and validate Daily high/low temps, for every location using the local sunset and sunrise times!
- Tap once on the widget to open the app
- New weather alert formatting
- Guide for installi

FIXES
⁃ fix for monthly labels not showing sometimes
⁃ fix for negative number of dry/fog/snow days
⁃ unfix typographically correct minus sign
⁃ rare widget bugs

- new Settings icon
- faster current location
- faster widget loading
- improved weather alert dismissal
Continued improvement on fast loading and minimal battery usage.
We're back already with speed improvements — about 2.2x faster GPS locating and weather data downloading.
Quick fixes for iOS 11. That's all! We wanted to quickly fix small issues as we continue working hard on a big update!
Quick fix related to launching the app from the Today Widget. We continue to work hard on a big update! Your support keeps us fueled – thank you. :)
Quick fix related to launching the app from the Today Widget. We are working hard on a brand new Weather Line, including iPhone X compatibility. Your support is our fuel, thank you. :)

iPhone X!

# NEW
- iPhone X support
- Added Rain Amount (X only)
- Added Cloud Cover (X only)
- Hide precipitation panel when no short term forecast is available

# FIXES
- Improved readability of Add Location view table
- Ad

Added Rain Amount and Cloud Cover to iPhone Plus and iPhone X.

# NEW
- new Rain Amount data (X & Plus)
- new Cloud Cover data (X & Plus)

# FIXES
- adjust graphs to be more centered
- rename "Amount" to "Rain", since Dark
Details about upcoming Weather Line 2 changes and launch

All-new design, 21 new features including your top requests, and a change to subscription pricing.

WHY SUBSCRIPTIONS


1. TO SURVIVE

We are not rich trying to get richer – we are making no money and trying to make enough to survive.

NEW
• New Emoji Theme - get your forecast from emojis
• Pick your Dark Theme - customize which dark mode (and light mode too actually) gets activated by the system
• "What's New" screen... so you'll always know what's new, since no one reads thes
NEW: Long-press on anything to share it! Try it on graphs, radar, or monthly averages. There's no extra text or link – it just shares.

Huuuge update – faster app loading, new forecast data, new historical data, and fixed snow/precip amounts.

▶ FASTER LOADING
Up to 4x faster app launching and data loading! We heard your feedback (and we're not done yet). Thank you for bearing wi

Huuuge update – faster app loading, new forecast data, new historical data, and fixed snow/precip amounts.

▶ FASTER LOADING
Up to 4x faster app launching and data loading! We heard your feedback (and we're not done yet). Thank you for bearing wi
Fixes display issue in app walkthrough.
Small bug fix. The most recent version removed 3rd party ads.

FIX for unavailable forecasts.

We apologize for the issue, it was caused by a sudden unannounced change from our free data provider.

新增语言
通过“支持”联系我们，帮助翻译为更多语言

新增语言
通过“支持”联系我们，帮助翻译为更多语言
小而重要的改进，可以使应用程序更流畅，更快速地运行。
小而重要的改进，可以使应用程序更流畅，更快速地运行。

iOS14小组件
在主屏预览，包括全部小部件尺寸，全部主题，和一个全新的动态主题。需要更新到iOS 14。
空气质量指数(AQI)
查看今日及未来空气质量，使用Supercharge来解锁
Sirikit和捷径
使用Siri查看天气预报，将Weather Line添加到捷径中
3,862

"窗口小部件的升级和AQI提供由PurpleAir。

PURPLEAIR AQI
•空气质量指数现在自动PurpleAir提供。增压要求。

WIDGET特点
•“向前看” - 看到你的未来。当晚上8点以后你的天气是稳定的，向前看在4天的天气预报。
•高/低临时工 - 增加了对小部件每小时
•苹果深色主题 - 完美匹配您的小工具，苹果的暗模式的颜色。增压要求。

新控件
•每日预测现在的小部件可用

FIXES
•主题

"窗口小部件的升级和AQI提供由PurpleAir。

PURPLEAIR AQI
•空气质量指数现在自动PurpleAir提供。增压要求。

WIDGET特点
•“向前看” - 看到你的未来。当晚上8点以后你的天气是稳定的，向前看在4天的天气预报。
•高/低临时工 - 增加了对小部件每小时
•苹果深色主题 - 完美匹配您的小工具，苹果的暗模式的颜色。增压要求。

新控件
•每日预测现在的小部件可用

FIXES
•主题

根据您的反馈进行调整。保持它的到来！

- 减少小部件从全屏幕“向前看”，以字幕只
- 从> 150到> 100减少AQI插件阈
- 更好地解释如何小部件作品，设置
- 修复每日预测的off-by-一个从中午12点和凌晨4点
- 提高“匹配天气状况”为主题的对比
- 提高部件升级为免费用户
- 更改AQI空状态“ - ”
- 修正毫米汞柱单位
- 隐藏“查看计划”和“管理订阅”终身用户

请支持我们有5颗
Bug fixes.

新功能
- 支持 iPhone 12
- 每小时数据增加到预测120小时
- 增加了空气质量指数和LRAPA空气质量指数转换系数(一旦PurpleAir更新空气质量指数，美国环保局将很快跟进)

修复/改进
- 改进了设置到当前位置时，小工具的错误处理
- 修复了每日高温匹配的每小时温度
- 修复了可能识别出错误订阅状态
- 修复了空气质量指数超过300
- 修复了点击反馈按钮后，无法启动反馈表单的问题
- 增加了对所有屏幕尺寸的主题支持<
